events.message: The customer has filed a claim reporting a collision between their vehicle and another car at an intersection during heavy rain.
The claim has been categorized under 'Auto Accident' after confirming the description and keywords related to the vehicle collision.
A claims agent has been assigned to handle the customer's auto accident claim and will initiate further steps shortly.
The customer has been officially notified that their auto accident claim has been received and is under review.
Requested police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and driver’s license copies to proceed with the investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents including photos and police report within the stipulated deadline.
The investigation team has started evaluating the submitted evidence and statements related to the vehicle accident claim.
Investigation concluded confirming the accident liability and assessing damage costs for claim processing.
A settlement offer covering repair costs and rental reimbursement has been proposed to the customer for review.
The customer appreciated the prompt processing and accepted the proposed settlement offer without further negotiation.
The claim has been formally approved and all terms agreed upon after satisfactory documentation and feedback.
Payment covering repair and associated expenses was issued to the customer’s account as per the approved settlement.
The claim file has been closed following successful payment and final confirmation from the customer.
All documents and related records for this auto accident claim have been securely archived for future reference.
